arts.ttl: Indian Wells: Jack Draper beats Joao Fonseca to reach third round of BNP Paribas Open
arts.sum: Jack Draper said it was special playing new'superstar' Joao Fonseca and is feeling really good physically for the rest of the tournament. Jack Draper advanced to the third round of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells on Saturday as he cruised past wild card Joao Fonseca in straight sets.
